# Load the shiny library
library(shiny)

# Define the UI for the Shiny app
ui <- fluidPage(
  tabsetPanel(
    tabPanel(title = "About Me", 
    tags$h2("About Me"),
      tags$p("Name: John Doe"),
      tags$img(src = "your_image.jpg", width = 200),
      tags$p("Location: New York"),
      tags$p("Interests: Photography, Hiking, Cooking"),
      tags$p("Work: Software Engineer"),
      tags$p("Education: B.S. in Computer Science"),
      tags$div(
        tags$p("The other tabs represent work / analyses that I have completed. Please check them out!"),
        style = "text-align: center; font-style: italic;"
      )
    )
  )
)



# Run the Shiny app
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
